intro.dialog: Solara has found some gifts within the depths of this nightmare.

came_back_intro.dialog: Solara has found more gifts in the depths of this nightmare!

store_text.dialog: Solara can bring you gifts, but Solara will need some of your |C3|karma.|C0|

upgrade_text.dialog: Solara can use the power of |C3|Tetrids|C0| and |C3|Dream Petals|C0| to find more gifts!

leave_text.dialog: Solara will leave to search for more gifts.

comment_no_gifts.dialog: Solara can't find any more gifts right now!

comment_max_level.dialog: Solara is the most powerful |C3|Queen of Dreams|C0| that ever was!

comment_one.dialog: |wave|A simple gift.|norm||L|Solara will need |C3|[VAL1] karma|C0| to get this.

comment_two.dialog: |wave|A lovely gift.|norm||L|Solara will need |C3|[VAL1] karma|C0| to get this.

comment_three.dialog: |wave|A very powerful gift!|norm||L|Solara will need |C3|[VAL1] karma|C0| to get this.

comment_bonus.dialog: |wave|A bonus gift.|norm||L|Solara will need |C3|[VAL1] karma|C0| to get this.

comment_quick.dialog: |wave|A quick gift.|norm||L|Solara will need |C3|[VAL1] karma|C0| to get this.

comment_unknown.dialog: Solara can't tell what it is.|L|Solara will need |C3|[VAL1] karma|C0| to get this.

comment_limit.dialog: You are holding too many quick gifts to carry this one.

comment_over.dialog: You don't have enough |C3|karma|C0| for this one!|L|Solara needs |C3|[VAL1] karma|C0| to get this.

gift_bought.dialog: |wave|Solara has retrieved this gift for you!

final_gift_bought.dialog: Solara has run out of gifts!
Solara will need to go searching again.

comment_gift_zero.dialog: With some tetrid power, Solara can find |C3|[VAL1]|C0| from now on!

comment_gift_up.dialog: Solara can reach |C3|[VAL1]|C0| right now, but with some tetrid power, Solara can find another one!

comment_gift_max.dialog: Solara can reach |C3|[VAL1]|C0| every time you visit!

comment_cost_down.dialog: With some tetrid power, Solara will need |C3|1 less karma|C0| to reach any |C3|[VAL1]|C0| from now on!

comment_cost_max.dialog: Solara can reach |C3|[VAL1]|C0| while using as little karma as possible!

comment_upgrade_fail.dialog: Solara needs you to radiate |C3|[VAL1] Dream Petals|C0| to increase this power.

comment_upgrade_fail_1.dialog: Solara needs you to radiate at least |C3|1 Dream Petal|C0| to increase this power.

first_upgrade.dialog: |shake|Solara is now more powerful than ever before!
Just remember that Solara has to actually go and find the gifts first.
|wave|Solara will have more gifts next time!

middle_upgrade.dialog: |shake|Solara is now more powerful than ever before!

final_upgrade.dialog: |shake|Solara is now the most powerful |C3|Queen of Dreams|C0| that ever was!
|shake|Sweet dreams will take over this land of nightmares!
|shake|By the time Solara is finished, nightmares will be checking under their beds for Solara!
|shake|Solara will make sure that you have enough gifts to survive forever!

green_comment.dialog: Yellow and Blue do mix into such a lovely color.

yellow_comment.dialog: |shake|Yellow!|L||wave|Solara's favorite!|L||norm||C3|These will give Solara the most power!

orange_comment.dialog: Who mixed all these yellow ones with red?

purple_comment.dialog: Are you sure these are Tetrids?|L|They feel like nothing to Solara.

radiant_comment.dialog: These have all the colors!|L||wave|Especially yellow!

leaving.dialog: Solara will now go searching for more gifts!
|wave|Enjoy the rest of this endless nightmare!
